message: Let's be fair, I'll take the bigger share this time, but we can work something out in the future rounds.
You got a bigger share last time, now it's my turn!
Let's be reasonable, I'll take slightly less than you did last time, but we can work towards a more even split.
You're getting closer to being reasonable, but I'm not giving up yet!
Let's split it evenly. It's better than arguing all day and getting nothing at all.
